original: intros opn cvu_dom ex_fin_lim x dx. assert (cvs_dom: CVS_dom fn D). { apply CVU_CVS_dom. apply cvu_dom. } split. - now apply cvs_dom. - split. + intros. apply ex_fin_lim. apply dx. + apply ex_lim_seq_adj with (u := fun n => Lim (fn n) x) (v := fun n => Lim_seq (fun n => fn n x)). * apply filter_forall. intros n. apply is_lim_comp_seq with (f := Lim (fn n)) (g := fun y => Lim_seq (fun n0 => fn n0 y)). -- apply cvu_dom. intros eps. apply locally_ball. intros y iny. specialize (cvu_dom eps). rewrite CVU_dom_Reals. apply cvu_dom. intros _ _. apply iny. apply cvu_dom. -- apply locally_ball. intros y _ _. reflexivity. * now apply Lim_seq_ext.
